name: King's Field: Dark Side Box
synopsis: In celebration of the 20th Anniversary of FromSoftware, Inc, the developers, decided to have a special release of the four King's Field games. The collector's box includes Japanese Editions of ''King's Field'' (PS), ''King's Field II'' (PS), ''King's Field III'' (PS), [[King's Field: The Ancient City]] as well as "memorial disc" historical DVD, soundtrack CD, folding printed map of the series' world, hardcover art book and consolidated operating manual. {{CollectionText}}.
